languages.text: {n}Густые брови сенешаля нависают над потемневшими глазами, как грозовые тучи.{/n} "Будет исполнено. Больше вы от меня не услышите ничего, кроме отчетов о моих прямых обязанностях". {n}Версениан молчит несколько секунд.{/n} "Вероятно, мое присутствие при вашей свите будет весьма скоротечным. А теперь давайте покинем этот притон".

{n}The Seneschal's thick brows loom over his darkening eyes like thunder clouds.{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain. You will not hear anything from me apart from reports on my direct duties." {n}Abelard is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "I suppose my presence in your retinue will be extremely short-lived. But for now, let us leave this cesspit."
languages.original_text: {n}Густые брови сенешаля нависают над потемневшими глазами, как грозовые тучи.{/n} "Будет исполнено. А теперь давайте покинем этот притон".

You will not hear anything from me apart from reports on my direct duties." {n}Abelard is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "I suppose my presence in your retinue will be extremely short-lived. But for now, let us leave this cesspit."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}总领脸上浓密的眉毛，仿佛乌云一样罩住了他变暗的双眼。{/n}“遵命，舰长大人。今后除了与我的职责相关的直接报告之外，您不会再从我这里听到任何消息了。”{n}阿贝拉德沉默了几秒钟。{/n}“恐怕，我在您的随行人员之中也留不了多久了。不过，我们还是先离开这个粪坑吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal's thick brows loom over his darkening eyes like thunder clouds.{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain. You will not hear anything from me apart from reports on my direct duties." {n}Abelard is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "I suppose my presence in your retinue will be extremely short-lived. But for now, let us leave this cesspit."

traits.locale_text: {n}总领脸上浓密的眉毛，仿佛乌云一样罩住了他变暗的双眼。{/n}“遵命，舰长大人。今后除了与我的职责相关的直接报告之外，您不会再从我这里听到任何消息了。”{n}阿贝拉德沉默了几秒钟。{/n}“恐怕，我在您的随行人员之中也留不了多久了。不过，我们还是先离开这个粪坑吧。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Las cejas pobladas del Senescal enmarcan sus ojos oscuros como nubes de tormenta.{/n} «Sí, Lord Capitán. Lo único que oirá de mi boca serán los informes sobre mis obligaciones directas». {n}Abelard guarda silencio durante unos segundos.{/n} «Imagino que mi presencia en su séquito será excepcionalmente breve. Aun así, por ahora será mejor que nos marchemos de este agujero».
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal's thick brows loom over his darkening eyes like thunder clouds.{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain. You will not hear anything from me apart from reports on my direct duties." {n}Abelard is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "I suppose my presence in your retinue will be extremely short-lived. But for now, let us leave this cesspit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las cejas pobladas del Senescal enmarcan sus ojos oscuros como nubes de tormenta.{/n} «Sí, Lord Capitán. Lo único que oirá de mi boca serán los informes sobre mis obligaciones directas». {n}Abelard guarda silencio durante unos segundos.{/n} «Imagino que mi presencia en su séquito será excepcionalmente breve. Aun así, por ahora será mejor que nos marchemos de este agujero».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}家令長の太い眉が、雷雲のように暗くなった目を覆っている。{/n}「はい、ロード・キャプテン。我の直接の責務に関する報告以外は、こちらから伝えることは何もございません」{n}アベラルドは数秒間沈黙した。{/n}「あなたの従者としての我の存在は、極めて短いものでしょう。ですが、今はこの掃き溜めを出ましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal's thick brows loom over his darkening eyes like thunder clouds.{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain. You will not hear anything from me apart from reports on my direct duties." {n}Abelard is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "I suppose my presence in your retinue will be extremely short-lived. But for now, let us leave this cesspit."

traits.locale_text: {n}家令長の太い眉が、雷雲のように暗くなった目を覆っている。{/n}「はい、ロード・キャプテン。我の直接の責務に関する報告以外は、こちらから伝えることは何もございません」{n}アベラルドは数秒間沈黙した。{/n}「あなたの従者としての我の存在は、極めて短いものでしょう。ですが、今はこの掃き溜めを出ましょう」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die dicken Brauen des Truchsess schweben wie Gewitterwolken über seinen düsteren Augen.{/n} "Ja, Lord Captain. Ihr werdet von mir nichts mehr hören außer Berichte zu meinen direkten Pflichten." {n}Abelard schweigt einige Sekunden.{/n} "Meine Zugehörigkeit zu Eurem Gefolge wird wohl von sehr kurzer Dauer sein. Doch nun lasst uns dieses Loch verlassen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal's thick brows loom over his darkening eyes like thunder clouds.{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain. You will not hear anything from me apart from reports on my direct duties." {n}Abelard is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "I suppose my presence in your retinue will be extremely short-lived. But for now, let us leave this cesspit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die dicken Brauen des Truchsess schweben wie Gewitterwolken über seinen düsteren Augen.{/n} "Ja, Lord Captain. Ihr werdet von mir nichts mehr hören außer Berichte zu meinen direkten Pflichten." {n}Abelard schweigt einige Sekunden.{/n} "Meine Zugehörigkeit zu Eurem Gefolge wird wohl von sehr kurzer Dauer sein. Doch nun lasst uns dieses Loch verlassen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les sourcils épais du sénéchal planent sur ses yeux tels deux nuages orageux à mesure que son regard s'assombrit.{/n} « Compris, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je ne vous importunerai plus si ce n'est pour vous informer des décisions prises dans le cadre de ma mission à bord du vaisseau. » {n}Abélard garde le silence quelques instants.{/n} « J'imagine que je ne ferai bientôt plus partie de votre équipage, mais pour l'heure, je serais d'avis de quitter ce cloaque au plus vite. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal's thick brows loom over his darkening eyes like thunder clouds.{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain. You will not hear anything from me apart from reports on my direct duties." {n}Abelard is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "I suppose my presence in your retinue will be extremely short-lived. But for now, let us leave this cesspit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les sourcils épais du sénéchal planent sur ses yeux tels deux nuages orageux à mesure que son regard s'assombrit.{/n} « Compris, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je ne vous importunerai plus si ce n'est pour vous informer des décisions prises dans le cadre de ma mission à bord du vaisseau. » {n}Abélard garde le silence quelques instants.{/n} « J'imagine que je ne ferai bientôt plus partie de votre équipage, mais pour l'heure, je serais d'avis de quitter ce cloaque au plus vite. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Seneşal'in kalın kaşları, karanlığa gömülen gözlerinin üzerinde fırtına bulutları gibi asılıyor.{/n} "Başüstüne Lord Kaptan. Üstüme vazife olan işlerden hariç benden tek laf işitmeyeceksiniz." {n}Abelard, bir müddet susuyor.{/n} "Maiyetinizde çok kısa bir müddet kalabileceğim kanaatindeyim. Fakat önce şu bok çukurundan çıkmalı."
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal's thick brows loom over his darkening eyes like thunder clouds.{/n} "Yes, Lord Captain. You will not hear anything from me apart from reports on my direct duties." {n}Abelard is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "I suppose my presence in your retinue will be extremely short-lived. But for now, let us leave this cesspit."

Üstüme vazife olan işlerden hariç benden tek laf işitmeyeceksiniz." {n}Abelard, bir müddet susuyor.{/n} "Maiyetinizde çok kısa bir müddet kalabileceğim kanaatindeyim. Fakat önce şu bok çukurundan çıkmalı."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
